roleset.name: (present as) having fewer representatives than ideal/actual
roleset.note: UNDERREPRESENT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from underrepresent.01-v)

role.descr: domain in which arg1 is underrepresented

example.name: passive
example.text: So that means that in contrast to the general population they-1 are actually slightly under represented *-1 therefore the NHS does not rely on immigrants as much as leftie TSR users claim they do .
example.arg: in contrast to the general population

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Research released Wednesday shows that [women and girls]-1 are still underrepresented *-1 in career and technical education (CTE)

example.name: args0,1
example.text: These figures were often cited in ethnopolitical campaigns, but they underrepresented the impact of the Indian and pro-India movement on the legal recognition of indigenous lands in Brazil.
example.arg: the impact of the Indian and pro-India movement on the legal recognition of indigenous lands in Brazil.
